Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that Barack Obama has been "busted" on felony charges, when there is no evidence to support this claim.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Barack Obama committed treason, as there is no evidence to support this assertion.

Understate: There is no understatement bias present in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by distorting the account of Barack Obama's last few months in office and presenting false information.
